text: Mimopogonius is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Mimopogonius. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Mimopogonius hirsutus Breuning, 1974 * Mimopogonius hovorei Martins & Galileo, 2009 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Mimopogonius
